meanings.definition: To shout or cheer loudly in celebration or approval.
meanings.sent1: The crowd was huzzaing after the team scored a goal.
meanings.sent2: People were huzzaing at the concert when their favorite song played.
meanings.sent3: The children started huzzaing when they saw the magician pull a rabbit out of a hat.
meanings.sent4: The fans kept huzzaing as the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: Huzzaing with joy, the community welcomed the hero back home.

meanings.definition: The act of shouting or cheering loudly in celebration or approval.
meanings.sent1: The huzzaing of the crowd could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but join in the huzzaing at the parade.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected huzzaing from the audience caught the performers off guard.
meanings.sent4: The huzzaing of the fans echoed through the stadium.
meanings.sent5: Amidst the huzzaing, the team lifted the championship trophy.
